PackageOracle.name: DA_EPISODE_TITLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EPISODE_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.161010000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_episode_title;

body.name: DA_EPISODE_TITLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EPISODE_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.52.171956000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_episode_title.add(fx), parms=' || season_num || '|' || episode_num || '|' || original_air_dt || '|' || episode_title_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_episode_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.season_num
,a.episode_num
,a.original_air_dt
,a.episode_title_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.season_num
,add.episode_num
,add.original_air_dt
,add.episode_title_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.title_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_episode_title.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_episode_title.add, parms=' || season_num || '|' || episode_num || '|' || original_air_dt || '|' || episode_title_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_episode_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.season_num
,a.episode_num
,a.original_air_dt
,a.episode_title_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.season_num
,add.episode_num
,add.original_air_dt
,add.episode_title_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_episode_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,season_num IN VARCHAR2
,episode_num IN VARCHAR2
,original_air_dt IN DATE
,episode_title_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_episode_title.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || season_num || '|' || episode_num || '|' || original_air_dt || '|' || episode_title_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_episode_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.season_num
,a.episode_num
,a.original_air_dt
,a.episode_title_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.title_id
,add.season_num
,add.episode_num
,add.original_air_dt
,add.episode_title_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_episode_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_episode_title.del, parms=' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_episode_title a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.title_id = del.title_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_episode_title.del');

END del;

END da_episode_title;
